statements: SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy
SELECT id, policy_name FROM data_retention_policy
SELECT id, policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy WHERE is_active = TRUE
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy WHERE retention_period > '30 days'
SELECT id, policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy WHERE is_active = FALSE
SELECT id, policy_name, retention_period, is_active FROM data_retention_policy WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT id, policy_name FROM data_retention_policy WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '3 months';
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy WHERE is_active = FALSE ORDER BY id DESC, policy_name ASC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT record_id, record_data, creation_date FROM data_records WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%backup%';
SELECT record_id, creation_date, record_data FROM data_records ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '1 year';
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE id = 101 ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_records WHERE policy_id IN (SELECT id FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period < INTERVAL '3 months');
SELECT record_data, creation_date FROM data_records WHERE policy_id = 201 ORDER BY creation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(record_id) AS record_count FROM data_records GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 10 ORDER BY record_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT entry_id, category_id, created_at FROM data_entries WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, data_type FROM data_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS entry_count FROM data_categories JOIN data_entries ON data_categories.category_id = data_entries.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY entry_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies WHERE policy_name = 'Example Policy';

SELECT data_entries.entry_data, data_categories.category_name FROM data_entries JOIN data_categories ON data_entries.category_id = data_categories.category_id ORDER BY data_categories.category_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '1 month' ORDER BY policy_name;

SELECT entry_id, category_name, created_at FROM data_entries JOIN data_categories ON data_entries.category_id = data_categories.category_id WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_at) = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT category_id, category_name, COUNT(*) AS entry_count FROM data_entries JOIN data_categories ON data_entries.category_id = data_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_id, category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY entry_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policy;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policy;
SELECT data_name, data_value, creation_date FROM retention_data;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policy WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_logs ORDER BY compliance_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM retention_data ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM retention_data WHERE policy_id = 3
SELECT log_id, deletion_date FROM deletion_logs JOIN retention_data ON deletion_logs.data_id = retention_data.data_id WHERE deletion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policy WHERE policy_name LIKE 'P%'
SELECT compliance_status, compliance_id FROM compliance_logs ORDER BY compliance_id
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM DataRetentionPolicies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_name FROM DataRetentionPolicies WHERE retention_period > 365 AND retention_period < 730;
SELECT DISTINCT action_type FROM PoliciesAuditLogs ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataRetentionPolicies ORDER BY policy_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM DataRetentionPolicies WHERE retention_period > 30
SELECT policy_name, retention_period, last_updated FROM DataRetentionPolicies WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM Users ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM UserActivities WHERE activity_type='login' OR activity_type='view' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10
